tool_description: This API generates a Business Model Canvas (BMC) based on provided business idea, business category, operating country etc. in a JSON format
name: Business Model Canvas (BMC) Generator
title: Business Model Canvas (BMC) Generator

api_list.name: generate
api_list.description: This API facilitates the automatic generation of a Business Model Canvas (BMC) based on user-provided inputs such as business idea, category, country, and state. The BMC is a strategic management tool used to visually represent a business model on a single page, enabling entrepreneurs to understand, evaluate, and communicate key aspects of their business.

optional_parameters.name: idea
optional_parameters.default: I want to start developing API that%27s backed by AI Models like ChatGPT, then host them on RapidAPI for sell
